hero.title: SHARE ANY THING
hero.subtitle: THE FUTURE OF BUSINESS COMMUNICATION
hero.description: Communication between people easily and in the fastest way while saving time and money. We can help you easily widen your social network in a new and easy way for all of your clients whether you are an artist, photographer, businessman, salesperson, model, celebrity, recruiter, athlete, business owner, or entrepreneur.

partners.subTitle: People And Businesses Place Their Trust In All Of Our Services And Products
partners.description2: Quickly And Easily, While Reducing Costs

smartCard.title: CONNECT WITH
smartCard.description: Get digital business cards for yourself or your team,
smartCard.feature1: Works on any type of device.
smartCard.feature2: The perfect alternative to the business card for teams and individuals
smartCard.feature3: Compatible with NFC technology and Qr Code.

howItWork.step1: Get any of our products you like
howItWork.step3: Start setting up your profile account
howItWork.step5: Share your profile using NFC or QR code

devices.title: Compatible Devices
devices.descriptionAndroid: Almost all Android smartphones are compatible even if the person you want to share with don't have a compatible phone, you can still use our products! Simply use scan to share your information
devices.descriptionIos: Works with iPhone phones starting from Model 7 as well as later versions, you only need to activate the NFC function in the settings and also with older versions it can be used by QR code.

features.title: Special Features
features.premium1: It's the perfect alternative to the digital business card for teams and individuals .
features.premium2: No need to bother in case of changing the phone number or email or losing any of your information , you can easily update it .
features.premium3: It works with iphone or Android even with older versions you can use QR code scanning .
features.premium4: With one swipe you can share all your information, phone numbers, Social Media, important files, even your custom links and more.
features.premium5: Flexible, You don't need an app and Other people do not need to have the App or have access to our products in order to share your information with them.
features.premium6: The ability to add one link and direct people to it.
features.secure1: No need to worry—your account passwords are not required. Simply copy the links, and they will work automatically.
features.secure2: If you lose the product, you can instantly disable it to prevent anyone from accessing your information.
features.environmentSaving1: The future of technology Eco-Friendly by reducing the use of paper and compensating it with technological solutions
features.paymentsProtection: Secure your transactions with our advanced payment protection system
features.secureEnvironment: Operate in a fully secure and encrypted environment
features.blockchainBanking: Experience the future of banking with blockchain technology

countries.title: You Can Get Our Products Whatever You Go

profile.title: Profile
profile.instantlyRedirectCustomers: Direct Link Mode instantly redirects customers to any link without browsing your full profile.
profile.step1: 1- Select the link you want to direct others to and set it as direct.
profile.step3: 3- Share the link via our smart products or QR code.
profile.whenThisFeatureIsEnabled: When this feature is enabled, a form automatically appears when you share your digital card, allowing you to instantly collect contact details.
profile.collectInfoStep1: 1. Share your digital card with someone.
profile.collectInfoStep2: 2. A quick form will pop up for them to fill out.
profile.collectInfoStep3: 3. Once completed, the person is automatically saved as a contact.
profile.collectInfoStep4: 4. You can export the data to an Excel file for easy management.

editProfilePage.usernameEnglishOnly: Username must contain only English letters, numbers, and special characters (@, #, $, _)

profileInformation.areYouSureYouWantToUnlockThisAccount: Are you sure you want to unlock this account?
profileInformation.descriptionActive: When activating this option, your profile will be locked, and no one will be able to access your data when scanning the digital card or any of your smart products. Instead, they will see a message stating that the account is currently unavailable. You can reactivate your profile at any time through the same option.

lockedAccountPopup.thisAccountIsCurrentlyUnavailable: This account is currently unavailable. It seems that the digital card owner has disabled their profile at the moment. You can leave them a message and they will contact you when their account is reactivated.

description.createUpToFiveDifferentProfilesDescripti: Create up to 5 profiles (Business – Personal) and switch between them anytime.
description.customizeColorsAndStyleDescription: Choose your favorite colors and pick from 3 display styles to match your brand or personality.
description.offlineSharingModeDescription: Let others access your info even if they don’t have internet – anytime, anywhere.
description.verifiedAccountDescription: Get a verified badge to make your profile look more professional and stand out.
description.exportAndMangeContactsDescription: Save and organize the info of everyone who connects with your card – with easy search, filters, and Excel export.
description.performanceTrackingAndViewsDescription: Track how people interact with your card – views, saved contacts, and more with built-in analytics.
description.unlimitedLinksDescription: Add multiple links for each platform – like social media, websites, email, WhatsApp, and more – with no limits.
description.yourOwnWorkSpaceDescription: Create a personalized space to add files, images, custom links, and more – all in one place.
